setDescription: Set your birthday date on the server.

set.userDescription: Which user do you want to set the date of birth for? - MANAGER ONLY.
set.success: Your birthday has been set to {{date}} on this server.
set.success_target: {{target}}'s birthday was set to {{date}} on this server
set.hasNotPermissionManagesRoles: You are not allowed to manage other users birthdays.
set.roleHigher: The selected member has a role position that is higher than or equal to yours

remove.userDescription: Remove a Birthday for a Person - MANAGER ONLY
remove.notRegistered: Your birthday is not recorded. Use {{command}} to save it.
remove.hasNotPermissionManagesRoles: You do not have permission to delete birthdays
remove.target: You do not have permission to delete this user's birthday.

show.userDescription: Show this user's birthday - MANAGER ONLY
show.title: {{emoji}} Birthday
show.notRegistered: Your birthday is not registered. Use {{command}} to set it.

test.userDescription: Test this user's birthday - MANAGER ONLY
